title: Fix transport rail+SAF missing from synthesis
description:
store_sector_data() in src/database/store.py:170-173 uses demande_recharge_par_plage() which only returns road+maritime+fluvial charging demand (~112 TWh). It excludes rail_elec_twh and aviation_elec_saf_twh (~75 TWh combined).

Fix in store_sector_data():
1. consommation_electrifiee_twh already imported as transport_elec on line 131
2. Before the loop, compute: electrifie = transport_elec(transport_config) then rail_saf_kw = (electrifie['rail_elec_twh'] + electrifie['aviation_elec_saf_twh']) * 1e9 / 8760
3. Inside the inner loop, add rail_saf_kw to transport_kw

Verify: sum of transport_kw across all 60 slots * their durations * 30 days * 12 / 1e9 should approximate total_elec_twh from module (~187 TWh).

title: Centralize PV params in config.py, remove hardcoding
description:
PV breakdown params are hardcoded in main.py:94-98 and src/database/store.py:38-44 instead of coming from src/config.py.

Fix:
1. In src/config.py ProductionConfig, add fields: solar_gwc_maisons=200.0, solar_gwc_collectif=50.0, solar_gwc_centrales=250.0, nombre_maisons=20_000_000, nombre_collectifs=10_000_000, kwc_par_maison=10.0, kwc_par_collectif=5.0
2. In store.py:store_parameters(), replace hardcoded values with config.production.xxx — method currently takes a plain config. Need to pass the full EnergyModelConfig.
3. In main.py:compute_synthesis(), replace lines 94-98 with reads from config.production.

title: Remove hardcoded gas default in rapport.py
description:
src/rapport.py has gaz_twh=114.0 as default in 3 functions (lines 28, 97, 155). The rapport can silently use stale values.

Fix:
1. Change signature to gaz_twh: float (no default) in generer_resume_executif, generer_section_resultats, generer_rapport_complet
2. Update tests/test_rapport.py to pass explicit gaz_twh=114.0 in all test calls
3. Check rapport_complet.ipynb for cells that call these without the parameter
